text: Sano ngamiya (syasikupelechedwa ku Nyumba jakuchimbichika ja Likaaba kuwa mbepesi), tusitesile kukwenu kuwa mu imanyilo ya (Dini ja) Allah, nkwete wanganyammwe mu syalakwesyo yambone (yejinji). Basi likolangani Lina lya Allah pa syalakwesyo ndema jasikwima m’misela (pa kusisikita), sano pati sigwile chamumbalati mwakwe (panyuma pakusisikita), basi lyagani mu syalakwesyo, ni kun’diisya nkwikutila (jwangaawendawenda wandu), ni nkuwendawenda jwakwe. Iyyoyopeyo tusijepepesye kukwenu syalakwesyo kuti m’be wakutogolela
